ModMetaData.name: [XND] TE Turret Expansion
ModMetaData.author: XeoNovaDan
ModMetaData.description: Current version: v1.1.1 (10th Jul 2018)\n\nAdds two carefully-balanced turrets which use the framework extensions offered by Turret Extensions. Also makes the vanilla turrets upgradable and buffs the autocannon turret's accuracy.
